Moo::InternalSortedChannel

Moo::InternalSortedChannel Class Reference

This class implements the internal sorted channel, the internal sorted channel is rendered with the sorted channel, with it's triangles sorted against each other. More...

#include <visual_channels.hpp>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

virtual void addItem (VertexSnapshotPtr pVSS, PrimitivePtr pPrimitives, EffectMaterialPtr pMaterial, uint32 primitiveGroup, float zDistance, StaticVertexColoursPtr pStaticVertexColours)
 This method creates a draw item that needs to have its triangles sorted internally and adds it to the sorted channel.

Detailed Description

This class implements the internal sorted channel, the internal sorted channel is rendered with the sorted channel, with it's triangles sorted against each other.

Member Function Documentation

void Moo::InternalSortedChannel::addItem ( VertexSnapshotPtr  pVSS,
PrimitivePtr  pPrimitives,
EffectMaterialPtr  pMaterial,
uint32  primitiveGroup,
float  zDistance,
StaticVertexColoursPtr  pStaticVertexColours 
) [virtual]

This method creates a draw item that needs to have its triangles sorted internally and adds it to the sorted channel.

Parameters:
pVSS VertextSnapshot containing the vertices to use for drawing.
pPrimitives the indices
pMaterial the material used by this item
primitiveGroup the primitiveGroup to draw
zDistance the sorting distance of this item
pStaticVertexColours the static vertex colours for this draw item.

Reimplemented from Moo::SortedChannel.
